Chez L'Amour
45 San Marco
St Augustine, FL
info@bitesbubblesandjazz.com
(904) 481-8117
© 2025 Chez L'Amour
Site By:
STA Marketing & PR

BITES, BUBBLES & JAZZ
Chez L’Amour provides the perfect setting for a romantic date night, fun outing or special occasion. Social tapas dining, the stellar drink menu and incredible music make Chez L’Amour the perfect place to unwind, celebrate and enjoy friends and family in a cozy atmosphere.
​
Located at 45 San Marco in uptown St. Augustine, Chez L’Amour has its own parking lot providing guests easy access to all that lies within the House of Love.
CREATIVE TAPAS
Chef Ellie and her team create internationally-inspired dishes using locally-sourced ingredients to deliver fresh, unique flavors. Small plates served in a social dining atmosphere allow culinary explorers to sample an array of flavors with friends and family.
Flavor-infused signature cocktails and an extensive list of wine and bubbly cover all needs for aperitifs, pairings and digestifs during happy hour, dinner and after-dinner drinks.
SIGNATURE DRINKS
St. Augustine’s finest bakery, Creme de la Cocoa, makes Chez L’Amour’s delectable and artisanal desserts, such as the Spanish Magnolia Wedding Cake and Datil Chocolate Cheesecake.
LUXURIOUS DESSERTS
SPECIAL EVENTS
Chez L’Amour is the perfect venue for private events, office parties, rehearsal dinners, birthday celebrations, receptions and banquets. To book your next event, please email:
info@bitesbubblesandjazz.com
.
Chez L’Amour showcases internationally recognized performers, as well as the most talented local and regional musicians. Visit our events page to see the full line-up.
